title: HELP! I NEED SOMEBODY! Gameplay issue, league or me?
body:
So, first of all here's my setup:
i7 @ 4.3ghz
1TB SSD
64gb RAM
Win 10
GTX 1080 OC
Asus 144hz monitor

On to the issue at hand!

I can run everyone of my other games fine including Overwatch, CSGO, and more.
However, with League... I cannot get it to stay at 144fps locked with vsync ON. I need this because of the 144hz monitor (or at least 72fps locked, half vsync)
When the game starts, perfect.
Minions spawn it gets worse, 100fps.
Teamfights... 60-80fps ...

On the computer I have it should be 144fps vsync EASY.

Please help!

replies.body: Head over to the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows) and try the steps there. Let me know if anything helps.

This is a great place to start. When you specifically see FPS issues that get worse over time, it's typically an indication that your install of League may have corrupt or missing files. I strongly recommend trying the ["repair your game files"](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#wq5) section of the guide. If you continue to see issues after working through the guide, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

Let me know if you have any questions.

I like getting your replies, but the OP doesn't get a notification like this and might never see the additional information you provided. Please let me know if I say something incorrect, but I think you should reply to the OP instead of me in most cases.
